title: Packet loss
body:
I think there is some packet loss. 
example: When i charm with ahri i dont see the charm, game freeze for a sec and then suddenly dead and i see anything.

anyone else got probs with packet loss

replies.body: The best way to know for sure is through a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) of the impacted game.  Check that out and let me know what you find.  We'll go from there!
This proved i have a packet loss every game. now what do i do?

Heya, if the score suggested packet loss then we'll want to find the origin of the cause.  This is most commonly a result of local network issues, but it could also be how your ISP is routing to us.  Your best bet for now would be go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, and test it in a custom game to see if things cleared up.
Having the same issue, since 2/3 patches ago
